content: I was getting dozens of solicitations from campaigns and PACs across the country and texted back STOP to many of them. I think I may have accidentally done so for the Harris campaign, because I haven't been getting any texts for a couple of weeks now. I tried texting JOIN to 30330, but I'm not sure if that will fix the problem. Can anyone check on this for me?

Hi <@1268674602931064902> I appreciate your wanting to never miss a text from the campaign. If you texted 30330 that signed you up again and you should be receiving texts going forward. Let me know in a few days if you are still waiting to receive texts.
You might also try going to the 30330 text message thread on your phone and texting JOIN or START to see if that helps. I think JOIN got me back in when I opted out at some point.
